channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: At least 2 street light are not working in hawthorn road, 17th June
item.description:
2 street light at top of hawthorn road not working and have been like this since 27th may maybe longer this is the second time I have reported it, others have as well. It needs dealing with or I will talk to the neighbours about stopping payments of council tax.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Hawthorn Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barking dog on right on way through yard, 17th June
item.description:
There is a small dog on the PROW through the farm yard that barks aggressively at path users. There is no owner present.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drain, 16th June
item.description:
The drain blocked which after medium rain causes the surface water to almost reach the middle of the carriageway which causes cyclists and cars to take evasive action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queens Lane, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Blocked Drain, 16th June
item.description:
Drain in the parking bays near the pedestrian gate to Montpellier Gardens is blocked. After medium rain this causes the water to exceed several parking bays along the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Spa Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked Drain, 16th June
item.description:
A block drain is not allowing water to drain away and causes cyclists and cars to take evasive action to avoid. One would think that after the road had been recently resurfaced drain maintenance would also have taken place?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Paul's Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
